actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a credit against income tax for electrical energy fuel surcharges imposed by public utilities.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow individuals an income tax credit for the electrical fuel surcharges imposed by public utilities.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to allow individuals a credit against income tax for electrical energy fuel surcharges imposed by public utilities.
